content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Water supply system
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
-  Pipe group at fluid system 150237, connecting offshore pump to boiler

### Electricity distribution system
Consists of following entities
-  Electricity group with poles at positions [(x=120.5,y=-26.5),(x=111.5,y=-27.5),(x=115.5,y=-32.5),(x=115.5,y=-30.5),(x=112.5,y=-24.5),(x=111.5,y=-30.5)]

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using furnace
-  Ensure furnace has ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
### Errors when using boiler
-  Ensure boiler has fuel before starting the process
### Errors when using steam engine
-  Ensure steam engine is connected to a fluid system before starting the process
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before placing a new entity

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
-  Important variables:
  -  `inventory`: a dictionary containing the current inventory of the agent, with item names as keys and quantities as values.
  -  `entities`: a list of entities on the map, with their positions, statuses, and other relevant information.
